name: Mines of Mars
description: Some suspected that Mars once harbored life. There was a reason that it wasn't ever found.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7.0 Processor: Intel or Amd 1.5 GHZ or above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel onboard graphics card or above DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: OSX Processor: Intel or Amd 1.5 GHZ or above Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel onboard graphics card or above DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard sound card
